database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: Upload for CID/HCD/ETD MetaSPS paper (JPR, 2013)
entry.description:
CID/HCD/ETD spectra from 6prot mixture - K110713_ra*.raw Remaining spectra were used to train PepNovo's HCD and ETD scoring models
Enzyme file codes: k - Lys-C (cterm side of K) r - Arg-C (cterm side of R) c - Chtmotrypsin (cterm side of FYWL) t - Trypsin (cterm side of RK) d - Asp-N (nterm side of D) e - Glu-C (cterm side of ED) m - CNBr (cterm side of M)
